# Intent Class Identifiers

**API Collection**

Identify intents that user notifications specify.

## Payments

- **INSendPaymentIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendPaymentIntent] object.
- **INRequestPaymentIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRequestPaymentIntent] object.

## Photos

- **INSearchForPhotosIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForPhotosIntent] object.
- **INStartPhotoPlaybackIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INStartPhotoPlaybackIntent] object.

## Workouts

- **INStartWorkoutIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INStartWorkoutIntent] object.
- **INPauseWorkoutIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPauseWorkoutIntent] object.
- **INResumeWorkoutIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INResumeWorkoutIntent] object.
- **INCancelWorkoutIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelWorkoutIntent] object.
- **INEndWorkoutIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INEndWorkoutIntent] object.

## Ride Booking

- **INListRideOptionsIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INListRideOptionsIntent] object.
- **INRequestRideIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRequestRideIntent] object.
- **INGetRideStatusIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INGetRideStatusIntent] object.

## CarPlay

- **INSetAudioSourceInCarIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSetAudioSourceInCarIntent] object.
- **INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent] object.
- **INSetDefrosterSettingsInCarIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSetDefrosterSettingsInCarIntent] object.
- **INSetSeatSettingsInCarIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSetSeatSettingsInCarIntent] object.
- **INSaveProfileInCarIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSaveProfileInCarIntent] object.
- **INSetProfileInCarIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSetProfileInCarIntent] object.
- **INSetRadioStationIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSetRadioStationIntent] object.

## Messaging

- **INSearchForMessagesIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForMessagesIntent] object.
- **INSendMessageIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendMessageIntent] object.
- **INSetMessageAttributeIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSetMessageAttributeIntent] object.

## VoIP Calling

- **INStartCallIntentIdentifier**
- **INSearchCallHistoryIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchCallHistoryIntent] object.
- **INAnswerCallIntentIdentifier**
- **INHangUpCallIntentIdentifier**
- **INStartAudioCallIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INStartAudioCallIntent] object.
- **INStartVideoCallIntentIdentifier**: An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INStartVideoCallIntent] object.

## Standard Intents

- **Car Commands**: Manage vehicle door locks and get the vehicle’s status.
- **Lists and Notes**: Create and manage notes and to-do list items.
- **Media**: Listen and control audio through Siri Intents, or listen and watch media content from your app with shortcuts.
- **Messaging**: Send messages and search the user’s received messages.
- **Payments**: Send payments between users or pay bills.
- **Restaurant Reservations**: Create and manage restaurant reservations with help from the Maps app.
- **Ride Booking**: Book rides and report their status.
- **VoIP Calling**: Initiate calls and search the user’s call history.
- **Workouts**: Start, end, and manage fitness routines.
